verses.plain: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth, may Israel now say:

tokens.t: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth, may Israel now say:

verses.plain: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth: yet they have not prevailed against me.

tokens.t: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth: yet they have not prevailed against me.

verses.plain: The plowers plowed upon my back: they made long their furrows.

tokens.t: The plowers plowed upon my back: they made long their furrows.

verses.plain: The LORD is righteous: he hath cut asunder the cords of the wicked.

tokens.t: righteous: he hath cut asunder the cords of the wicked.

verses.plain: Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.

tokens.t: Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.

verses.plain: Let them be as the grass upon the housetops, which withereth afore it groweth up:

tokens.t: Let them be as the grass
the housetops, which withereth afore it groweth up:

verses.plain: Wherewith the mower filleth not his hand; nor he that bindeth sheaves his bosom.

tokens.t: Wherewith the mower filleth not his hand; nor he that bindeth sheaves his bosom.

verses.plain: Neither do they which go by say, The blessing of the LORD be upon you: we bless you in the name of the LORD.

tokens.t: Neither do they which go by say, The blessing of the
